item.description: (Bloomberg) -- DWS Group, the investment arm of Deutsche Bank AG, reported net inflows of €18.3 billion ($19.7 billion) in the third quarter and improved its cost guidance for the year, signaling a recovery in performance. The inflows, which beat analyst estimates, came mainly into its lower-margin ...
